original_text: Thus said the Lord to me: “Go and stand in the People's Gate, by which the kings of Judah enter and by which they go out, and in all the gates of Jerusalem,
korean_text: 여호와께서 내게 이와 같이 말씀하시되 너는 가서 유다 왕들이 출입하는 평민의 문과 예루살렘 모든 문에 서서

sentences.original_text: Thus said the Lord to me:
Go and stand in the People's Gate,
by which the kings of Judah enter
and by which they go out,
and in all the gates of Jerusalem,
